1.0.1.name: connect20/folio3_maintenanceMode
1.0.1.description: The basic functionality is to put the website into Maintenance mode. Additionally this extension has a count down and it also supports IP White listing.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
